system.description:
Your physical application of psionic abilities has reached a new pinnacle through trained, adept-like focus.  You gain the following abilities:

  • You gain one additional maneuver from the Awakened Mind tradition.
  • You gain an additional Psionic power, following the normal rules for doing so.
  • You may also add your Intelligence modifier to all strength, dexterity, and constitution saving throws.
